snippet: The members of a banned Islamist group were fatally shot as the police stepped up their hunt for militants after attacks on mosques, Christian priests and Hindu temples.
abstract: Bangladeshi police say they fatally shot two suspected militants from banned Islamic extremist group Jamaat-ul-Mujahedeen, after recent spate of attacks.
lead_paragraph: The members of a banned Islamist group were fatally shot as the police stepped up their hunt for militants after attacks on mosques, Christian priests and Hindu temples.
